        public User login()
        Description copied from interface: Login
        Logs a candidate, an HR, or an Admin to the system. With their LogState changed to LogState.LOGGED_OUT.

      • resetUserPassword

        public User resetUserPassword(User user)
        A helper method to change the password of the Admin. Not that the password is taken form the Admin by calling the login form method reponsible for that.
        Parameters:
        user - the Admin whose password is to be resetted.
